metadata.synopsis: The Tadpoled Skeleton Scouts spot the player and give them a brief warning before noticing the Shadowquake and running
metadata.how_to_trigger: Get spotted by the skeletons while unavailable to talk (exception made for Silenced players)

0.speaker: GROUP_SHA_TadpoledSkeletons
0.text: You tread where you are not wanted - leave.
0.context: NodeContext: Raspy, undead. Warning off an exploring player

1.speaker: GROUP_SHA_TadpoledSkeletons
1.context: NodeContext: Raspy, undead. Alarm, supernaturally sensing danger (in the broader region of a large underground temple rather than right before them)
